alert.note: Alert for Yazoo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 10 at 11:37AM CDT until June 10 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 PM CDT FOR RANKIN...EAST CENTRAL YAZOO...CENTRAL HINDS AND MADISON COUNTIES... At 1137 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Way to near Pocahontas to Raymond, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Jackson, Madison and Ridgeland around 1145 AM CDT. Pearl, Byram, Flowood, Richland, Terry and Sharon around 1155 AM CDT. Brandon around 1200 PM CDT. Florence, Whites, Farmhaven and Monterey around 1205 PM CDT. Star around 1215 PM CDT. Piney Woods and Leesburg around 1220 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
